skills.name: Public Speaking
skills.brief_description: Learn Public Speaking traditionally and for the digital age while developing critical thinking skills
skills.description: Have you ever wanted to communicate and present your ideas at a highly effective level? Learn to research, plan, organize, and present your speech while developing critical thinking and other important skills to business, relationships, and every day life.
benefits: Get real world practice and experience

skills.name: Emotional Intelligence
skills.brief_description: Learn to recognize, use, understand and manage your own others emotions in a positive way
skills.description: Are you interested in being more self-aware? Have you ever wondered about how self-regulation or how to be more stable in chaotic situations? Is being motivated, understanding others and their perspectives, and developing social skills important to you? Sign up for a meeting focuses around emotional intelligence today!

skills.name: Motivated Reasoning
skills.brief_description: Learn to understand why we make the decisions we do
skills.description: We want so badly to be rational humans, but under further investigation, we learn that even the most rational and logical decisions stem from our emotions. Learn why this happens and how to be aware of it so you can better udnerstand yourself and others.
benefits: Understand what people are really saying
Get intimate with your own human nature

skills.name: Critical Thinking
skills.brief_description: Begin to think more critically about the important things
skills.description: This training will use a lot of the same methods used on the LSAT to help members develops skills to argue more effectively, ask better questions, and discover the truth.
benefits: Develop the skills of a lawyer

skills.name: Effective Debate
skills.brief_description: Learn to strengthen your arguments with evidence
skills.description: Ever want to go head to head with somebody to argue your ideas? Maybe they'll prove you wrong, maybe you'll prove them wrong, but either way, you're both going to come out with your swords sharpened and have better arguments than you walked in with.

skills.name: Overcoming Cognitive Biases
skills.brief_description: Eliminate the biases that are hurting your relationships and stunting your growth
skills.description: There are hundreds of cognitive biases that stunt our growth and prevent us from living our best lives. Learn the cognitive biases that are most common in your life. Once you're aware of and acknowledge them, stomping them out is the easy part.
benefits: Figure out which ones are hurting you
Eliminate them from your life once and for all

skills.name: Data Structures and Algorithms
skills.brief_description: Learn data structures and algorithm to solve problems in new ways
skills.description: Creating high-performing algorithms using data structures will encourage you to thinkin ways you've never thought before. Learn to solve problems efficiently and learn how others would solve the same problem and why. There are 1,000 ways to solve one problem, but whose solution is the most elegant of all?
benefits: Get that High Paying Job at Google or Amazon

skills.name: Situational Awareness
skills.brief_description: Learn to stay aware of your surroundings
skills.description: Take your learning outside the meetup with situational awareness scavenger hunts and games for prizes. Learn a person or environment's baseline and what to pay attention to to figure out when that baseline has changed.
benefits: Understand people and groups on a deeper level
